---
name: "Phase 2: UI - Graceful missing-state handling"
about: "Ensure pages with missing papers show helpful messaging and upload/feedback options." 
title: "[frontend][small] Phase2: UI - Graceful missing-state handling"
labels: frontend, enhancement
assignees: ""
---

Summary
-------
When a year or paper is missing from the manifest, the UI should clearly show "No papers available" and provide an option to report a missing paper or link to contact support.

Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Missing years/papers show a clear empty state with a contact/report CTA.
- [ ] Accessibility checks pass for the empty-state UI.

Tasks
- [ ] Create empty-state UI components and tests.
- [ ] Add a small feedback form or mailto link.

Estimate: S
